name: Danacons Mukbang Maker!
description:
WELCOME TO DANACONS MUKBANG MAKER!!

Use This Tool To Create Epic Mukbang Animations Like Danacon DoglikkK And Lzik Arruda Featuring Amazing Characters From Your Favorite Games Like FNF, Baldis Basics, Poppy Playtime, And More!

--

Unleash Your Creativity And Passion To Arrange A Simple, But Entertaining Mukbang Animation Where The Character Eats Foods Picked For Them From A SPINNING LUCKY WHEEL For All Ages! What Will The Wheel Pick Now? WATCH UNTIL THE END TO FIND OUT!

--

You Can Also Add Your Very Own CUSTOM CHARACTERS To Keep Up With What Indie Horror Game Is Trendy Here And Now! But If You Don't Want To, THAT IS OK! Because The Samples Folder Contains A HUGE Veriaty Of Premade Characters  For You To Pick From To Get Started Creating Entertaining Animations For Kids And Grownups Of Their Favorite Games!

--

"We Have Promiced In Our Channel Tariler To Bring Smiles On Peoples Faces With These High Quality Animations, And We Delivered! Now That We Are Making Our Epic Halal Mood Tools Available To The Public, We Want To Open Up The Oportunity For Everybody To Do Just That And To Bring Smiles On Peoples Faces! Spread Some Happiness, There Is Too Much Sadness In This World." 

-Lzik Arruda, Animator And Founder Of "Lzik Arruda Animation FNF Studio", 2069

SOURCE CODE FOR THE TOOL: https://github.com/ItzikArruda/Mukbang-Maker
